tool_description: Synchronizes shipping status updates with order management system, ensuring consistent order states across all platforms.

tracking_number.description: Tracking number associated with the shipment

error_messages: Order not found: The specified order_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid status: Status must be one of [pending, processing, shipped, in_transit, delivered, returned, cancelled].
Status transition not allowed: Cannot change from current status to specified new_status.
Database connection failed: Unable to connect to order management system.
usage: Provide order_id and new_status. Optionally include tracking_number when updating to shipped or in_transit status.
